website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for young boxing enthusiasts. These gloves offer a well-made build that introduces kids to the sport.
pros: Comfortable padding, secure Velcro, and easy-to-clean synthetic leather
A good training tool for kids 5 to 12
cons: These gloves are only for children

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my toddler son along with. My son and his father really enjoy playing with them. It is a perfect set of gloves for any beginner, especially for a toddler who is into anything! These are a little big for his tiny hands, he just turned 3 but we tighten the Velcro so the gloves don't come lose. I don't think he is holding it right when he puts his hands inside but they stay on just fine, usually a couple of minutes when he is done playing with them LOL
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son is obsessed with the game Punch Out & wants to be a boxer when he grows up, lol. He worked & saved up his money to buy these & they are perfect! My son is very rough with toys & these are never out of his sight. He sleeps with them behind his pillow & uses them every day. So far, after 6 weeks, they have shown no signs of wear (which is amazing for my son, lol).
customer_reviews.author: Eden Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner glove
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for any kid who is starting out at any type of martial arts who may or may not continue. You can find much higher priced gloves for the same quality. I needed something that would provide my kids with a good quality gloce without breaking the bank. The gloves are very firm and will take a little time to break in but very happy with the quality so far.
customer_reviews.author: Erica W

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My boys use these with out heavy bag and they love them. Had them for about 4 months and they're holding up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Fracture17x

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: They were comfortable, but they had a very strong unpleasant smell when we first received them. Thankfully the smell went away once we removed them from the packaging and left them out for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 5 and 9 year old sons
customer_reviews.text: My lovely mother-in-law bought these for my 2 boys for Christmas. So far they have enjoyed them and after a week of everyday play we still haven't had a busted lip or concussion.
customer_reviews.author: Rednek Girl's Guide to Romance

customer_reviews.title: Well made gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Waited a while to review as i wanted to c how long they last and so far so good. Awesome, Well made gloves. My grandson loves them and the focus mitts we purchased at the same time. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: They enjoy themselves a lot
customer_reviews.text: We bought two sets of these for our kids to each have a pair. They enjoy themselves a lot, while taking some aggression out. Seem to be durable as we have had them for a few months and they are used a lot. Still look like new.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 6yr old who got a speed bag spring for Christmas. The pair that came with the speed bag were to small and very cheap. These gloves are perfect padding and seem excellent quality. I had to get a blue pair for my 4yr old. They have a blast with each other and even come at me for some play boxing. Would recommend to anyone will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B

customer_reviews.title: Good for my 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son likes it for his boxing class. They seems to be well made. They are a few boys that have the same pair on that class. Theirs seem to be taking the beat well.
customer_reviews.author: Yuko

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew since he likes to hit everything & he lives up to his middle name "Danger". I love it. I'm going to give it to him for his birthday on Saturday. I'm sure he'll love it too. Great quality. I'm sure they'll fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Good fun exercise for my nephew.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They’re just the right size for my nephew. They’re 4oz gloves. Cool kiddish design. These float like a butterfly, sting like a bee
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 8 year old grandson. Plenty of padding and seem to be well made. The test will be how long they last, but so far so good and no indication of premature wear and tear!
customer_reviews.author: Albert Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the grandson to use on his bag and he loves them. They are very lightweight, not sure how good they will be for sparring though.
customer_reviews.author: Cagramps

customer_reviews.title: This is very nice boxing glove
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice boxing glove. I bought for my two daughters, 3 and 7 years old. The children were really enthusiastic and use the glove very often. quality is also great, is still no seam burst and nothing ripped. delivery was also very fast
customer_reviews.author: Wheat

customer_reviews.title: Good kids gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great little beginner set of gloves. My kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Caminante

customer_reviews.title: workmanship is good
customer_reviews.text: So that my children can react properly, I bought my girls own boxing gloves. Now the lower part of my boxing bag is regularly used. In my opinion, the workmanship is good and we are very happy with the kids boxing gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Garfield

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: They are awesome looking and feeling gloves. They run small.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 7 year old boy.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son needed these for a blow up punching bag we got him. They were perfect and fit really good with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Nephew uses these gloves many times a day & they have withstood his use. Best price on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: TamiT

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My son said it was comfortable to use for boxing. I love the attractive look of the gloves as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value / Cool Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are Christmas gifts for my 6 year old twins. For the price they are perfect. Size is just right! Very cool looking and seem durable in person.
customer_reviews.author: The Closer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly for my 7 year old. Nice design and feel.
customer_reviews.author: kyoo

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased them for 7 year old son. He is a bit on the small side but they fit him great. Great gloves easy enough for him to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Dianira

customer_reviews.title: Fit the bill nicely
customer_reviews.text: My younger brother wanted some boxing gloves because her friend had some etc, obviously realizing this would be a very short lived. I was reluctant to spend a lot of money, these fit the bill nicely! Reasonably well made, He will use it next month until she gets bored and wants to try another hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Most importantly, they fit my kid’s lil hands. With room to grow. They are made well also. The price was good! As was shipping!
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Gloves are too small for a child. My daughter is 9, they are comically small. I would say 5 years old would be the cut off. I had to return them. They are full leather, and very well made. They are 4oz, so they are about the size of mma gloves so you have a reference point.
customer_reviews.author: Eliseo Curcio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and cheap. Seems to be safe for kids with good padding.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a nephew of mine. He loves it it’s great quality it was inexpensive and it keeps him active
customer_reviews.author: C Frith

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loved this
customer_reviews.text: ordered for my grandson who lives in another state. He loved it
customer_reviews.author: Carol Zillig

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids to punch a bag or soft target. Not much padding and would be hard hitting if you let your kids beat each other with them.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Mannas

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My two year old would always grab my gloves so I got him these and he loves them. They are a little big but he will get to use them for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low quality material!
customer_reviews.text: It simply doesn't worth ur dollar money! Very low quality. I used it for a week, it displayed its defect. Its inner structure hurts fingers tips. Also its inside lining started coming off- in a week time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The gloves are excellent to keep kids entertained and moving
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are an excellent fit for the age group. My son loves the gloves. A great gift to keep kids moving and off their tablets.
customer_reviews.author: Elay and Dija

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great,
customer_reviews.text: It's been nearly 2 year since I bought the gloves for my son and he still uses them. Therefore, can only report positive and recommend it therefore further. I have to say that my son handles his equipment very well, so everything lasts a bit longer;
customer_reviews.author: Elizabethy

customer_reviews.title: Boxing glove
customer_reviews.text: Bought this boxing glove for my 8 yr. old grandson and they fit him and his 6 yr old sister to, great value best buy try them

customer_reviews.title: Design is very vibrant
customer_reviews.text: My two boys have really enjoyed playing with these gloves since receiving for birthday.These are made from a very durable material and are padded well enough for any young child to not be able to feel anything when using them. The design is very vibrant too

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Good item for the price. My son loves playing with these.

customer_reviews.text: Great junior size gloves. Seem pretty durable and padded well. My almost-six-year-old is loving them!

customer_reviews.title: High quality and durable.

customer_reviews.title: They fit well, hold on well and protect the hands.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for one of our boys to wear when playing with a punching bag we got for his brother. They fit well, hold on well and protect the hands. They haven't tried boxing with them yet, but imagine they will... Hopefully they help absorb some of the blow. ;)

product_meta.title: KUYOU Kids Boxing Gloves, Pu Kids Children Cartoon Sparring Boxing Gloves Training Age 5-12 Years
feature_bullets: Made of grain synthetic leather with machine made mould inside
Long wrist strap with good quality velcro closure gives proper control
4oz gloves are recommended for 5 to 12 year old
Performance PU Leather construction. High quality and durable material is easier to clean and maintain Gel Impact Protection Foam.
Ensures a secure fit for training while making the gloves easy to put on or take off
